sentences.sContent: If you have insomnia, try my simple cure.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have insomnia, try my simple cure.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有失眠症，试试我的简单疗法。

sentences.sContent: In my insomnia, you have to hold me to sleep.
sentences.sContent_eng: In my insomnia, you have to hold me to sleep.
sentences.sCn: 在我失眠的时候，你要抱着我睡。

sentences.sContent: I know someone with insomnia who only gets two hours of sleep each night.
sentences.sContent_eng: I know someone with insomnia who only gets two hours of sleep each night.
sentences.sCn: 我认识一个患有失眠症的人，他每天晚上只能睡上两个小时。

remMethod.val: in(不) + somn(睡眠) + ia(病) → 不能入睡的病 → 失眠

trans.tranOther: if you suffer from insomnia, you are not able to sleep
